titles.title: Transnational Criminal Organization Exploitation Threat Assessment Act
Transnational Criminal Organization Exploitation Threat Assessment Act

To require a threat assessment regarding the exploitation by transnational criminal organizations of the unaccompanied alien children services program within the United States, and for other purposes.
Transnational Criminal Organization Exploitation Threat Assessment Act

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Immigration and Border Security.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Crime, Terrorism, Homeland Security, and Investigations.

committee.subcommittee: Crime, Terrorism, Homeland Security, and Investigations
committee.name: House Judiciary
